content: I'm trying to figure out what the correct OID is for the R4 condition-category code system (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/codesystem-condition-category.html). The OID listed on the FHIR spec page is 2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.4.1073 but the OID when I navigate to http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-category is 2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.1.1073. Has anyone else noticed this or knows why these OID's might be mismatched?
OIDs were reassigned when the code systems were moved to terminology.hl7.org because of some past double uses (bad; my apologies). 2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.1.1073 is correct going forward
